abstract: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
snippet: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
lead_paragraph: St. Lawrence University: Each fall, 12 undergraduates are chosen to spend the semester in Arcadia, a camp site deep inside Adirondack National Park where they fend for themselves for four months, studying geology, botany and survival skills. Two current students wrote this account of what they grow, cook (in their yurt kitchen), and eat in the wild. -- Julia Moskin
